summary_detail.value: Lincoln Co. Sheriff has issued an Evacuation Order for the Spring Creek and Dodge Creek protection zones in the community of West Kootenai. Residents are asked to leave immediately in an orderly fashion. The Lincoln County Sheriff's officers are in the area notifying affected residents.The Red Cross has emergency services set up in the Church of God in Eureka, MT located at 1295 2nd Ave behind the First Interstate

title: EVACUATION NOTICE- SPRING CREEK AND DODGE CREEK ZONES (Caribou Fire Wildfire)
